tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_maintenance (
    vehicle_id INT,
    service_date DATE,
    service_type VARCHAR(100),
    part_replaced VARCHAR(100),
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE services ( 
   service_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   vehicle_id INT, 
   service_date TIMESTAMP, 
   service_description TEXT, 
   cost DECIMAL 
 );

CREATE TABLE services (
    service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    service_date DATE NOT NULL,
    service_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE services (
 service_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 service_date DATE NOT NULL,
 vehicle_id INT NOT NULL,
 service_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 service_description TEXT,
 service_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE parts_replaced (
 part_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 part_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 part_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
 service_id INT NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES services(service_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_costs (
 cost_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 service_id INT NOT NULL,
 part_id INT NOT NULL,
 labor_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
 total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES services(service_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES parts_replaced(part_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Services (service_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name STRING,
    vehicle_id UUID,
    service_date DATE,
    mechanic_name STRING,
    service_description STRING
)

CREATE TABLE PartsReplaced (part_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name STRING,
    vehicle_id UUID,
    part_cost DECIMAL,
    replacement_date DATE,
    mechanic_name STRING,
    part_description STRING
)

CREATE TABLE CostsIncurred (cost_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    cost_type STRING,
    vehicle_id UUID,
    cost_amount DECIMAL,
    cost_date DATE,
    description STRING
)

CREATE TABLE Vehicles (vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_make STRING,
    vehicle_model STRING,
    vehicle_year INT,
    vin_number STRING UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE Mechanics (mechanic_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    mechanic_name STRING,
    mechanic_phone STRING,
    mechanic_email STRING,
    mechanic_specialization STRING
)
